snippet: Ram Singh, the driver of a bus in which a 23-year-old woman was fatally gang raped, was found hanging from a ceiling grill on Monday, jail officials said.
abstract: Ram Singh, suspect in fatal gang rape case in New Delhi, is found dead in his prison cell, hanging from bedsheet noose; officials call death suicide, but Singh's family insists that he has been killed.

byline.original: By HEATHER TIMMONS and NIHARIKA MANDHANA
byline.contributor: Betwa Sharma and Malavika Vyawahare contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Ram Singh, the driver of a bus in which a 23-year-old woman was fatally gang raped, was found hanging from a ceiling grill on Monday, jail officials said.

headline.seo: Family Says India Rape Suspect’s Death Was Not Suicide
headline.main: India Rape Suspect’s Family Says His Death Wasn’t Suicide
headline.print_headline: India Rape Suspect’s Family Says His Death Wasn’t Suicide
